content:
I am Aarshvi, a second year graduate student in Computer Science at UMass Amherst. I am interested in theoretical foundations of machine learning.
My current research is in random projection methods for embedding subspaces that undergo nonlinear transformations. I am fortunate to be advised by Cameron Musco in my masters thesis.

title: Aarshvi Gajjar
